action.action-desc: Mr. Moore of West Virginia (for himself and Mr. McDowell) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to designate Easter Monday as a legal public holiday.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Easter Monday Act of 2025.

section.header: Easter Monday as a legal public holiday
